title: EU strongly condemns US travel ban on 5 individuals; row highlights 'deepening rift'
summary: The European Union has strongly condemned the US travel ban on 5 individuals, including EU officials. The row highlights the deepening rift between the US and its European allies over immigration and visa policies.
insight: 密切关注美国签证政策变化，为潜在游客提供最新签证信息。 长途竞品目的地竞争激烈，夏威夷需强化独特卖点（火山、海滩、文化）以差异化竞争。

title: Cambodia announces pilot visa-free policy for Chinese nationals from Jun 15 to Oct 15, 2026
summary: Cambodia announced a pilot visa-free policy for Chinese nationals from June 15 to October 15, 2026. Analysts noted that China's strong outbound tourism spending power has drawn growing attention from Southeast Asian countries seeking to boost their tourism industries.
insight: 签证便利化有利于提升中国游客赴美意愿，夏威夷可加大签证辅助服务宣传。 短途目的地对中国游客吸引力增强，夏威夷需强调"远途独特体验"的价值主张。

title: 韩国成为中国游客出境游最热门目的地
summary: 2025年10月约有47.2万名中国游客访问韩国，同比增长20.5%。在中国游客赴日意愿下降背景下，韩国成为替代选择。韩国业界增加中文导购、接入支付宝微信支付。
insight: 中国出境游市场复苏强劲，夏威夷应加大在华营销投入，抢占市场份额。
